cast.overview: After a Black Friday riot ends in tragedy, a mysterious Thanksgiving-inspired killer terrorizes Plymouth, Massachusetts - the birthplace of the holiday. Picking off residents one by one, what begins as random revenge killings are soon revealed to be part of a larger, sinister holiday plan.
cast.title: Thanksgiving

cast.overview: Two fugitive animals embark on an adventure across America while being pursued by an agent and ranger.
cast.title: Animal Friends

cast.overview: The sequel to Thanksgiving (2023). Plot TBA.
cast.title: Thanksgiving 2

cast.overview: To get revenge on her ex-boyfriend, an influencer attempts to transform an unpopular classmate into prom king.
cast.title: He's All That

cast.overview: Four crazy antiheroes on the run. Their leader is the unworldly innocent, naive Marnie, a house cat who is not allowed to leave the house and only knows about real life from television
cast.title: Spy Cat

cast.overview: Anthony Vaccarello presents “As Time Goes By,” inspired by Marcel Proust's masterpiece, In Search of Lost Time.  Love, Togetherness, Dreaming, Desire, Time, and Memory are recurring themes from Proust's work, and are reimagined by Anthony Vaccarello into a collection of six short films directed by Nadia Lee Cohen.
cast.title: As Time Goes By

cast.overview: Go behind the scenes of Addison's debut solo performance at The Box in NYC. This intimate short film captures her creative process and the start of an exciting new chapter.
cast.title: Spotify Presents: Addison - The Debut
